response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. Given its exceptional quality and potential impact on your endeavors, I am confident it could be worth up to $1,200,000 to you. After careful consideration, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $950,000. This offer represents a remarkable value considering the immense benefits it can bring to your organization. I look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success. Please let me know if you require any additional information or have questions about the product.", "product_price": 950000}
